Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
